altername_name: ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron
ToeJam & Earl in Panik auf Funkotron
ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron
ToeJam & Earl in Panic auf Funkotron
name: ToeJam & Earl in Panic on Funkotron
overview: ToeJam & Earl, the dynamic duo of funk, have returned home after much interplanetary partying, but all is not well. Pesky Earthlings hitched a ride on their Rapmaster Rocketship and are now causing havoc all over the once peaceful planet of Funkotron... and TJ&E are to blame!!! 17 levels of funkified action, including fungi jumping, arctic sliding and bubble bouncing. Check the scene with the Ultra-cool Funkscan... Hey, what's lurking in the bushes? Everyone into the pool!!! Explore underwater passages to find secret lairs and areas.
